Headline: #15 Jeffery Local Temporary Reroute at 51st/St. Lawrence
ShortDescription: 15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, Cottage Grove, 47th, King Drive and 51st due to, street blockage near 51st/St. Lawrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 51st, Cottage Grove, 47th, King Drive and 51st due to, street blockage near 51st/St. Lawrence.

Allow extra travel time.
